TextFlow.header: Use appropriate words and phrases to describe plot and characters
TextFlow.p: Written in 2007, the story begins with the three friends hiding out at Shell Cottage.
The events take place in an imaginary world.
(Much of) the tale is set at Hogwarts School.
The writer introduces us to several unusual characters.
The main characters are Harry Potter and his friends Hermione and Ron.
My favourite character is definitely Bellatrix Lestrange.
The story focuses on Harry for most of the film.
We experience the tale through the eyes of Severus Snape.
